text: Andriy Sorokin (; born 1 January 1991) is a Urainian professional footballer who plays for Avanhard Kramatorsk. In 2019, he played for Slavia Mozyr.Player's profile at pressball.by ==References== == External links == * * * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Belarus Category:Ukrainian expatriate sportspeople in Belarus Category:FC Inhulets-2 Petrove players Category:FC VPK-Ahro Shevchenkivka players Category:FC Myr Hornostayivka players Category:FC Slavia Mozyr players Category:FC Hirnyk-Sport Horishni Plavni players Category:FC Avanhard Kramatorsk players
title: Andriy Sorokin
